Name: Rat Mitigation Package - Adjusting penalties for littering.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adjusting penalties for littering
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
Summary: This bill would raise the penalties for the second and third violation of public littering.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Paragraph c of subdivision 9 of section 16-118 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 75 for the year 2016, is amended to read as follows:
      c. notwithstanding paragraph a of this subdivision, for any natural person violating subdivision 1 of this section:
      (1) 75 dollars for a first violation, and
      (2) [not less than 250 and not more than 350] 300 dollars for any second violation within any 12 month period, and
      (3) [not less than 350 and not more than 450] 400 dollars for any third violation within any 12 month period.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect 120 days after it becomes law.
